Package io.atlasmap.actions

Class StringSimpleFieldActions

java.lang.Object
io.atlasmap.actions.StringSimpleFieldActions
All Implemented Interfaces:
AtlasFieldAction
public class StringSimpleFieldActions extends Object implements AtlasFieldAction
The String field actions that doesn't have any parameter.

    • fileExtension

      public static String fileExtension(FileExtension action, String input)
      Gets the file extension from the source String if it has. For example, if the source string is "test.zip" then "zip" is returned. It returns "null" if there's no extension.
      Parameters:
      action - action model
      input - source
      Returns:
      file extension if exists, or null

    • removeFileExtension

      public static String removeFileExtension(RemoveFileExtension action, String input)
      Removes the file extension if there is, or returns the source String as-is. For example, if the source string is "test.zip", "test" is returned.
      Parameters:
      action - action model
      input - source
      Returns:
      processed

    • separateByDash

      public static String separateByDash(SeparateByDash action, String input)
      Replaces the string separator to the dash(-). The regular expression for detecting separators to replace is STRING_SEPARATOR_REGEX.
      Parameters:
      action - action model
      input - source
      Returns:
      processed

    • separateByUnderscore

      public static String separateByUnderscore(SeparateByUnderscore action, String input)
      Replaces the string separator to the underscore(_). The regular expression for detecting separators to replace is STRING_SEPARATOR_REGEX.
      Parameters:
      action - action model
      input - source
      Returns:
      processed

    • trim

      public static String trim(Trim action, String input)
